original_text: 设平面内两定点$F_{1}(-\sqrt{5}, 0), F_{2}(\sqrt{5}, 0)$，直线PF1和PF2相交于点P,且它们的斜率之积为定值$-\frac{4}{5}$；（Ⅰ）求动点P的轨迹C1的方程；（Ⅱ）设$M\left(0 ,\frac{1}{5}\right)$，N为抛物线C2：$y=x^{2}$上的一动点，过点N作抛物线C2的切线交曲线C1于P、Q两点，求$\Delta M P Q$面积的最大值． 1）设点P（x,y）,依题意则有$\frac{y}{x+\sqrt{5}} \cdot \frac{y}{x-\sqrt{5}}=-\frac{4}{5}(x \neq \pm \sqrt{5})$，整理得：$\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1(x \neq \pm \sqrt{5})$（2）设$N\left(t, t^{2}\right)$，则PQ的方程为：$y-t^{2}=2 t(x-t) \Rightarrow y=2 t x-t^{2}$，联立方程组$\left\{\begin{array}{l}{y=2 t x-t^{2}} \\ {\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1}\end{array}\right.$，消去y整理得：，有$\left\{\begin{array}{l}{\Delta=80\left(4+20 t^{2}-t^{4}\right)  >  0} \\ {x_{1}+x_{2}=\frac{20 t^{3}}{4+20 t^{2}}} \\ {x_{1} x_{2}=\frac{5 t^{4}-20}{4+20 t^{2}}}\end{array}\right.$，而$|P Q|=\sqrt{1+4 t^{2}} \times\left|x_{1}-x_{2}\right|=\sqrt{1+4 t^{2}} \times \frac{\sqrt{80\left(4+20 t^{2}-t^{4}\right)}}{4+20 t^{2}} ,d_{P Q}=\frac{\frac{1}{5}+t^{2}}{\sqrt{1+4 t^{2}}}$由$S_{\Delta M P Q}=\frac{1}{2}|P Q| d_{P Q}$代入化简得：即$S_{\Delta M P Q}=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{10} \sqrt{-\left(t^{2}-10\right)^{2}+104} \leq \frac{\sqrt{5}}{10} \cdot \sqrt{104}=\frac{\sqrt{130}}{5}$；当且仅当$t^{2}=10$时，取到最大值。 略
